author: P V
text:
A 16-year-old boy lost his fingers after an explosive went off in a farmland here in Denkanikottai on Friday.

The victim, Manjunath of Aniyakam village, was grazing livestock on Friday evening here along a patta land at the time of explosion.

The explosive went off when Manjunath had pulled some abandoned wires connected to detonators in a land of Maadevayya of Sathynayakkanpalli.

Without permission

According to sources, Maadhevayya had allegedly used explosives without permission to level his land. However, a few of the unexploded detonators were left on the site.

On Friday evening, curiosity had got better of Manjunath, who had pulled abandoned wires after which the explosion took place.

The victim lost all but one finger on his left hand and his right thumb, and suffered burns on his face. The boy was rushed to Denkanikottai GH and later referred to Dharmapuri Government Medical College hospital.

Police are on the lookout for Maadhevayya who has since been absconding.
title: Boy loses fingers in explosion
